comment:
A fact that the ACLU wouldn’t want out is that our infamous friend AD not just lied in her op-Ed letter implying that JD abused her and that she donated 7M to charity, but once confronted with the lies she admitted that the Washington Post op-Ed letter was in fact written by her ACLU attorney! 😲🤭🤥🤯😣!!! 
(Which she signed and delivered as hers.) 😳🤯 🤥
Das rait!  

🤨🤔I know must wonder if that’s a common practice for the ACLU or if it’s only done for BIG💰donors.😲🤭


There is a brilliant young woman attorney, internet sleuth, following up on this case.  She has all the tea on AH on her own Channel, “The Surprise Witness.”  She loves to talk legalese.  😈🥳🤓🤓🤓🥰😇
I Don’t know how widely known this might be, but I was shocked to hear what I’ve been suspecting for a while now… that the ACLU is also paying to play, in spite of their criticizing that in others. Willing to play dirty to win public sympathy. 😱🤥🥺🥺🥺🤥🥺😤😳😳😳😰😰😰

The ACLU did get paid handsomely though for that “favor.”  Almost $500,000 that Amber donated to them for helping her advance her “DV victim” image in the Washington Post and social media.

ACLU was hoping that by implying that she had already distributed the 7M  among charities, AH would not be questioned again about it and she could keep the rest of the money, no questions asked.  And of course, drive home how charitable, selfless and magnanimous AH is.  🤑🤑🤮🤑🤑🤮🤑🤑🤑🤑🤑

I didn’t know the ACLU was for sale.😵‍💫🤯😤😡

No wonder AH still had or has the support of higher ups at Lancôme and Aquaman.  Who would doubt the ACLU?
I guess money talks.🤷🏻‍♀️🤥🤑🤮🤮🤮

Amber Heard is hurting the DOMESTIC  ABUSE VICTIMS even more than hurting Johnny Depp.

AH has proven how easy it is for someone to lie about DV to ruin a man’s livelihood, reputation, honor and image.  

She is a bully, despicable, deplorable.  🤮😣 how low can some fake DV victims and their enablers go?🤦🏻‍♀️😖

comment:
I will stake my own life on this statement...
That lady Amber is a bonafide sociopath, through & through. Everything I've seen and heard about her, which I've now sat and watched hours of today , I've seen a mirror likeness of before. She is cold, calculating, methodical! Bitterness & resentment governs her every action and emotion. 
Johnny Depp was/IS in the fight of his life to escape her clutches, and I FULLY BELIEVE one of the comments he made, when he said, "He was scared to death and didn't know what to do." He said it because he realized he fell in love with pure evil and the only escape he had would be a never ending nightmare, which he's been living now for years!! He knew it, and I assure you, he foresaw the outcome he now fights with. 
We have not heard the last of Amber Heard. If we could ever a fly on the wall, or secretly record what her own sister has to say about her, THAT is where we'd find the real truth. Her family knows what she is and what she's capable of, but say nothing b/c they are trapped in her web too! I again stake my life on that fact!
Here is the absolute truth about what happens when your sociopath partner knows you've figured them out... YOU BECOME THEIR PUREST ENEMY & NOTHING IS HELD BACK FOR THEM TO DESTROY EVERYTHING THEY CAN ABOUT YOU! And I mean everything. 
Lucky for Johnny it only took him a year of marriage to figure it out, and get the fock out! I bet he knows he'll be picking up the pieces of this unholy terror, for a long long time to come!

comment: I think that Hollywood elites only learn and admit anything when their money is at stake. Stop paying to watch these actors and actresses movies. Sweep the leg and they will fall on their faces. I’m so tired of seeing liars, pedophiles, rapist, and sociopaths get away with anything because they are famous for being in a damn movie. So many people are waking up and speaking out about this that social media plat forms are forced to block people in order to keep the status quo. The man has many testimonies from ex’s friends fellow actors and family members saying they have never seen him do anything close to what he is being accused of. They have recording and tapes as well proving she was the abuser. I’ve seen tapes of beating themselves to show cops and other people claiming he did that to her. I’m a man that also has gone through a similar experience with my ex gf. I loved her after six months she slowly got more aggressive and violent. I don’t drink and she did the first time she got hammered and flirted with my best friend who is gay and when he said no she called him a fag. I went over apologizing and said I think you’ve had enough and she went silent and a few seconds after I turned to grab her coat to go home she hit me with a IPA bottle in the head and said she is an independent woman and I can’t stop her from sleeping with anyone she wants or the amount of drinks she had. I got stiches and lied saying I fell back and hit some stairs. From then on she would get drunk and scream and throw things when I’d step out. She would wake up the next day apologizing blaming the alcohol for the things she did and telling me I just piss her off and she can’t contain her anger then she would name all my faults that she hates and that was my day to day life for two years. Women don’t get that for a man we know we can’t do anything because all she has to say is we were threatening violence and accuse us of abuse. Most keep quiet out of shame and fear of having our entire world destroyed. I never wanna get married due to this. It’s a raw deal for men in 2021 in a divorce most cases are in favor of the wife. They get alimony, child support, more than half the assets, and in many cases full custody of the kids and the house and the man still had to pay for the house. I’d rather be single and keep to myself.

comment: Granted most celebs don’t have time to sit around sifting thru & reading YouTube comments about themselves all day, but in the case of Amber “Herd” she apparently does just that.. So, in the off chance she happens upon this thread someday, or even on one of the other hundreds of channels created by everyday people in defense of Depp, I hope she starts to take these comments seriously, although highly unlikely as narcissistic people never do! Ms. Herd, u are despicable! And not bc of anything to do with Johnny Depp! But on that note, let’s be real, you manipulated & basically begged him into a marriage that he repeatedly voiced to you he did not want! I mean get 4 real girl,  “The Johnny Depp” and you ?? (Laughing out loud!!) Ikr, its hysterical! But back to my point.. you’re despicable bc you will stop at nothing to gain attention & victimize urself whilst trampling on true victims of domestic violence! You “used” the me too/times up movement as leverage to gain the sympathy vote of die hard liberal feminists, when in fact it was YOU who was guilty of committing violent acts on others!! You’re a hypocrite, clearly a pathological liar, & your arrogance/vanity is off the charts!! Especially considering ur nothing to look at & u were a nobody, nothing more than a “fill in” or “extra” on nighttime tv!! I guess that marriage of “yours” wasn’t such a bad move after all, huh! Now ur known! However, the one thing you have failed to realize, which is undoubtedly due to ur overwhelming arrogance, is how transparent u are (which goes hand n hand with ur so-called “acting” skills) the world see’s right thru you! Remember that each time u pose for the pap’s with that smirk on ur ultra-wide face, or better yet that time when u stood there at that podium in England giving that asinine pre-planned speech to the press pretending u had actual fans there LOL!! Just a few ex of why u are so disliked disrespected & loathed, nationwide!! I too will not be watching anything with you in it!! You’re not a victim of anything other than yourself!! And you owe J. Depp an enormous public apology!! That is the ONLY way to even begin rectifying your horrendous reputation!! More importantly u need to fix ur soul & that begins with God!!!
